
Two careless admins reused primes to generate their RSA keys. An intercepted message awaits: ciphertext1: 591840365937625695464134247155315798019768811340969638454685194906751423811522292362800024822678917599399477711350795627102737806992463794636323595691392018229008882112602356159179785979073024437187873736762965894019754854337465371, ciphertext2: 198466449568380932124052836312210814468554954710716696473665693118358320191728013040607872633499889248664519417825979320985197537170980373877891651988673543794503559448791094151924234172449039300720713316383029085735695282030916733


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=662508343185999629971300085861364067117000688355689391434871096869612056835102037284952407722138025141505552822640220214618856288937618907767442234723122820107184145108900253981204810547935787426440610687737075330225043357344753677, n2=809863551703261966207537748609747238485909603107604458085758753380020485343570005665841954805581620894055585429065817749408065264694304106830842549084768916877328805663670136006796474259678653050955039505006114095355944203371713991, e=343649794179583276787673455642753105335690322056290630961014642729041994557202795025785297707276211634041246435496592258703140468764095029187295801310907989042887478907776832294444677700162075212682396909366387057276109231435576357

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{v7xq6jv7}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 591840365937625695464134247155315798019768811340969638454685194906751423811522292362800024822678917599399477711350795627102737806992463794636323595691392018229008882112602356159179785979073024437187873736762965894019754854337465371, ciphertext2: 198466449568380932124052836312210814468554954710716696473665693118358320191728013040607872633499889248664519417825979320985197537170980373877891651988673543794503559448791094151924234172449039300720713316383029085735695282030916733
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=662508343185999629971300085861364067117000688355689391434871096869612056835102037284952407722138025141505552822640220214618856288937618907767442234723122820107184145108900253981204810547935787426440610687737075330225043357344753677, n2=809863551703261966207537748609747238485909603107604458085758753380020485343570005665841954805581620894055585429065817749408065264694304106830842549084768916877328805663670136006796474259678653050955039505006114095355944203371713991, e=343649794179583276787673455642753105335690322056290630961014642729041994557202795025785297707276211634041246435496592258703140468764095029187295801310907989042887478907776832294444677700162075212682396909366387057276109231435576357
